Justify Self

# Justify Self

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                        | Support     |
| ---------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
justify-self-auto
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
justify-self-start
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
justify-self-end
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
justify-self-center
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
justify-self-stretch
``` | 🌐 Web only |
